text.section:
The Board of Trustees shall:
specify by resolution the number of members of the Investment Committee; and
except as provided in subsection (b)(2) of this section, appoint annually the members of the Investment Committee from the members of the Board of Trustees.

The Board of Trustees may:
set additional qualifications for public members; and
adopt regulations on ethical standards and conflicts of interest for public members.
By resolution, the Board of Trustees shall designate the chairman of the Investment Committee.
